about: A reimplementation of the default CKAN dataset schema

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. Some useful notes about the data

choices.label: 001: How does the country legally define the ownership of subsoil extractive resources?
002: Does the government publicly disclose data on extractive resource reserves?
003: How up-to-date is the publicly disclosed data on extractive resource reserves?
004: Is the data disclosed on extractive resource reserves machine-readable?
005: Does the government publicly disclose data on the volume of extractive resource production?
006: How up-to-date is the publicly disclosed data on the volume of extractive resource production?
007: Is the data disclosed on the volume of extractive resource production machine-readable?
008: Does the government publicly disclose data on the value of extractive resource exports?
009: How up-to-date is the publicly disclosed data on the value of extractive resource exports?
010: Is the data disclosed on the value of extractive resource exports machine-readable?
011: Does the government have an online data portal containing publicly available data on reserves, production and exports?
012: Does the online data portal contain the most recent publicly available data on reserves, production and exports?
013: Is the data contained in the online data portal machine-readable?
014: Is the data contained in the online data portal available under an open license?
015: Is the government required to publicly disclose all signed licenses/contracts with extractive companies?
016: From 2015 onwards, has the government publicly disclosed signed licences/contracts?
017: Has the government publicly disclosed all active licenses/contracts, regardless of when they were signed?
020: Are senior public officials required to publicly disclose their financial holdings in extractive companies?
021: From 2015 onwards, have senior public officials publicly disclosed their financial holdings in extractive companies?
022: Do rules require public disclosure of beneficial owners of extractive companies?
023: From 2015 onwards, have the beneficial owners of extractive companies been disclosed?
024: Who is the licensing authority (i.e. who has the authority to grant exploration and extraction rights to companies)?
025: Is the licensing authority independent from the SOE?
026: What licensing process does the licensing authority follow?
027: Do rules require that licenses/contracts be allocated by competitive bidding?
028: Is the government required to set pre-defined criteria by which companies become qualified to participate in a licensing process?
029: From 2015 onwards, did the licensing authority set minimum pre-defined criteria by which companies become qualified to participate in licensing processes?
030: Prior to each licensing process, is the licensing authority or other government agency required to disclose the license duration, royalty, production share and tax terms?
031: From 2015 onwards, and prior to each licensing process, did the licensing authority or other government agency disclose the license duration, royalty, production share and tax terms?
032: Prior to each licensing process, is the licensing authority required to disclose a list of biddable terms or negotiable terms?
033: From 2015 onwards, and prior to each licensing process, did the licensing authority actually disclose a list of biddable or negotiable terms?
034: Prior to each license processes, is the licensing authority required to disclose the rules governing the licensing process, such as auction or negotiation rules?
035: From 2015 onwards, and prior to each licensing process, did the licensing authority actually disclose the rules governing the licensing process, such as auction or negotiation rules?
036: Who has the primary authority to monitor compliance with the operational aspects of licenses/contracts?

037: Following each licensing process, is the licensing authority required to disclose the list of companies that submitted license applications (in the case of a first-come, first served; or negotiation round) or bids (in the case of an auction)?

038: From 2015 onwards, and after each licensing process, did the licensing authority actually disclose the list of companies that submitted license applications (in the case of a first-come, first served; or negotiation round) or bids (in the case of an auction)?
039: Following each licensing process, is the licensing authority required to publicly disclose the identity of the winning bidder or applicant?
040: From 2015 onwards, and after each licensing process, did the licensing authority actually disclose the identity of the winning bidder/applicant?
041: Following the licensing process, is the licensing authority required to publicly disclose the list of areas or blocks allocated?
042: From 2015 onwards, and after each licensing process, did the licensing authority actually disclose the list of areas/blocks allocated?
043: Are there rules that companies can follow to appeal licensing decisions?
044: Is the legislature required to ratify licenses/contracts?
045: Does a government agency maintain a publicly available registry of rights and license details (i.e. a cadastre)?
046: Does the publicly available registry of licenses/contracts cover areas/blocks?
047: Does the publicly available registry of licenses/contracts give the names of companies that hold an interest in a given area/block?
048: What is the fiscal system for extractive resources?
049: When does the country's fiscal year start and end?
050: Do rules specify how income tax payments should be calculated?
051: Do rules specify how royalties payments should be calculated?
052: Do rules specify how payments of state equity (or options for state equity such as carried interest) should be calculated?
053: Do rules specify how withholding tax payments should be calculated?
054: Do rules specify how the company and government production shares should be calculated?
055: Who is the tax authority (i.e. who has the authority to collect taxes and payments from extractive companies)?

056: Is the government required to publicly disclose data on payments from extractive companies to the government (specifically, the value of the tax/payment base and the actual taxes/payments received)?
057: Does the government publicly disclose data on the value of the tax/payment base?
058: How up-to-date is government data on the value of the tax/payment base?
059: Does the government publicly disclose data on the value of tax/payment receipts?
060: How up-to-date is government data on the value of tax/payment receipts?
061: Is the most recent publicly available data on tax and payment receipts disaggregated by payment type?
062: Is the government required to make all payments to the national treasury or deposit them into a national resource account, aside from amounts legally retained by SOEs?
063: Is the national tax authority required to audit extractive companies?
064: Is the national tax authority required to periodically be audited by an external body?
065: Was the national tax authority audited over the most recently completed audit timeframe?
066: Are extractive companies required to prepare an EIA and/or SIA prior to development?
067: Is there a requirement for the EIA and/or SIA to be publicly disclosed?
068: From 2015 onwards, have EIAs and/or SIAs been publicly disclosed?
069: Are extractive companies required to prepare environmental mitigation management plans prior to development?
070: Is there a requirement for environmental mitigation management plans to be publicly disclosed?
071: From 2015 onwards, have environmental mitigation management plans been publicly disclosed?
072: Do rules require the government to set penalties (i.e. fines, license suspension or license revocation) for non-compliance with environmental mitigation management plans?
073: Are there rules governing compensation to landowners or land users when project development interferes with their access to or use of land?
074: From 2015 onwards, have the procedures governing compensation to landowners or land users when project development interferes with their access to or use of land been adhered to?
075: Are there specific procedures governing the resettlement of land users when project development interferes with their access to or use of land?
076: From 2015 onwards, have the procedures governing the resettlement of land users when project development interferes with their access to or use of land been adhered to?
077: Are there rules governing rehabilitation and closure of extractive projects?
078: From 2015 onwards, have the procedures governing rehabilitation and closure of extractive projects been adhered to?
079: What proportion of equity shares does the government own in extractive companies?
080: What is the name of the largest company in which the government has a controlling share (i.e. an SOE)?
081: How is the largest extractive company in which the government has a controlling share (i.e. an SOE) funded?
082: Are there rules governing fiscal transfers between the government and the SOE?
083: Over the most recently completed fiscal year, has the government followed the rules governing fiscal transfers between itself and the SOE?
084: Does the government publicly disclose how much revenue it receives from the SOE?
085: Does the SOE publicly disclose how much revenue it transfers to the government?
086: Is the SOE required to publicly disclose annual reports containing information on its finances and operations?
087: Has the SOE publicly disclosed annual reports on its finances and operations?
088: Does the SOE's most recent public annual report include a balance sheet statement?
089: Does the SOE's most recent public annual report include a cash flow statement?
090: Does the SOE's most recent public annual report include an income statement?
091: Does the SOE publicly disclose its participation in joint ventures?
092: Does the SOE publicly disclose its levels of ownership in joint ventures?
093: Does the SOE publicly disclose the costs and revenues deriving from its participation in joint ventures?
094: Does the SOE publicly disclose a list of its subsidiaries?
095: Does the SOE publicly disclose the costs and revenues deriving from its subsidiaries?
096: Does the SOE publicly disclose its aggregate production volume?
097: Does the SOE publicly disclose its aggregate sales volume?
098: Do rules require a periodic audit of the SOE's financial statements by an external body?
099: Did an external body audit the SOE's annual financial statements over the most recently completed audit timeframe?
100: From 2015 onwards, did the SOE engage in non-operational activities (e.g. payments for social services, public infrastructure, fuel subsidies, national debt servicing)?
101: Has the SOE publicly disclosed the amount spent on non-operational activities?
102: Does the SOE receive a production share or in-kind payments from extractive companies?
103: How does the SOE market physical commodities?
104: Do rules specify how the SOE must sell its share of production?
105: Are there rules governing how the SOE must select buyers of its share of production?
106: Are there rules determining the prices at which the SOE's share of production should be sold?
107: Are there rules governing how the proceeds from the sale of the SOE's production share should be transferred to the government?
108: Over the most recently completed fiscal year, has the SOE adhered to the rules governing the sale of its share of production?
109: Is the SOE required to publicly disclose information on the sale of the government's share of production?
110: Does the SOE or government publicly disclose the sale volume of the government's share of production?
111: Does the SOE or government publicly disclose the sale value of the government's share of production?
112: Does the SOE or government publicly disclose the sale date of the government's share of production?
113: Does the SOE or government publicly disclose the names of those who have bought the government's share of production?
114: Is the majority of the SOE's board of directors independent of the government (i.e. at least half of all board members do not hold positions in the current central government)?
115: Does the SOE have a publicly available code of conduct?

116: Is the SOE required to submit annual reports to the legislature on its commercial, non-commercial (i.e. regulatory) and non-operational activities (i.e. activities not related to resource extraction)?
117: Does the country have a numerical fiscal rule?
118: Over the most recently completed fiscal year, did the government adhere to the numerical fiscal rule?
119: Do rules require that an external body periodically audit the government's adherence to the numerical fiscal rule?
120: Was the government's adherence to the fiscal rule audited over the most recently completed audit timeframe?
121: Does the government publicly disclose projections of extractive resource revenues?
122: Has the government publicly disclosed a national budget that has been enacted for the current fiscal year?
123: Does the most recent enacted budget include projections (i.e. forecasts) of extractive resource revenues?
124: For the most recently completed fiscal year, did the government publicly disclose the total resource revenue received?
125: For the most recently completed fiscal year, did the government publicly disclose total government expenditures?
126: Does the government publicly disclose the level of national debt?
127: Is the most recent publicly available information on the national debt disaggregated by currency denomination (i.e. foreign or domestic)?
128: Does the central government transfer extractive resource revenues to subnational governments?
129: Are there specific rules governing the transfer of extractive resource revenues (i.e. are these rules distinct from those governing other types of transfers)?
130: Do rules specify that subnational governments of producing areas should receive a higher share of extractive resource revenues than those of non-producing areas?
131: Do rules specify which agencies are responsible for transferring extractive resource revenues to subnational governments?
132: Do rules specify which subnational agencies receive the extractive resource revenues transferred from the central government?
133: Do rules specify a formula governing the transfer of extractive resource revenues between the central government and subnational governments?

134: If there is a formula governing the transfer of extractive resource revenue between the central government and subnational governments, does this formula specify the amount of revenue received by each subnational government?
135: From 2015 onwards, did the central government disclose the amount of revenues transferred to subnational governments?
136: How up-to-date is the information publicly disclosed by the central government on the amount of revenues transferred to subnational governments?
137: Do rules specify different arrangements for the sharing of extractive resource revenues by revenue stream (i.e. if there are different arrangements for different taxes)?
138: From 2015 onwards, has the central government publicly disclosed the amount of revenue transferred by revenue stream?
139: Do rules specify arrangements for the sharing of extractive resource revenues by commodity?
140: From 2015 onwards, has the central government publicly disclosed the amount of revenue transferred by commodity?
141: From 2015 onwards, has the central government adhered to formulas governing the transfer of resource revenues to subnational governments?
142: Do rules require that an external body periodically audit the transfers of extractive resource revenues to subnational governments?
143: Were transfers of extractive resource revenues to subnational governments externally audited over the most recently completed audit timeframe?
144: Does the country have a natural resource fund which is funded by extractive resource revenues?
145: If there are multiple natural resource funds, which is the largest?
146: Are there numeric rules governing the size of withdrawals from the natural resource fund?
147: From 2015 onwards, has the government adhered to the numeric rules governing the size of withdrawals from natural resource funds?
148: Do rules require that withdrawals and spending from the natural resource fund pass through the national budget?
149: From 2015 onwards, have withdrawals and spending from the natural resource fund actually passed through the national budget?
150: Are there numeric rules governing the size of deposits into the natural resource fund?
151: From 2015 onwards, has the government adhered to the numeric rules governing the size of deposits into the natural resource fund?
152: Are there numeric rules governing deposits into the natural resource fund by revenue stream?
153: From 2015 onwards, has the government adhered to the numeric rules governing deposits into the natural resource fund by revenue stream?
154: Is the natural resource fund prohibited from investing in domestic assets without budgetary approval?
155: Is the natural resource fund prohibited from investing in certain asset classes or investment types?
156: From 2015 onwards, has the natural resource fund adhered to rules limiting asset class or investment types?
157: Is the natural resource fund required to produce annual financial reports?
158: Is the natural resource fund required to publicly disclose these annual financial reports?
159: Does the natural resource fund publicly disclose its annual financial reports?
160: Does the natural resource fund's most recent publicly available annual financial report specify the size of the fund?
161: Does the natural resource fund's most recent publicly available annual financial report disclose deposit and withdrawal amounts?
162: Does the natural resource fund's most recent publicly available annual financial report specify the rate of return made on its investments?
163: Does the natural resource fund's most recent publicly available annual financial report include a list of assets held?
164: Does the natural resource fund's most recent publicly available annual financial report specify the fund's asset allocation by asset class?
165: Do rules require an external body to periodically audit the natural resource fund's annual financial reports?
166: Were these annual financial reports audited over the most recently completed audit timeframe?
167: Is the legislature required to review the natural resource fund's annual financial reports?
168: From 2015 onwards, has the legislature reviewed the natural resource fund's annual financial reports?
